titles.title: Savannah CRTC Dining Hall Construction Act
Savannah CRTC Dining Hall Construction Act
A bill to authorize the appropriation of amounts for the construction of a dining hall and services training facility at Savannah Air National Guard Base, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Savannah CRTC Dining Hall Construction Act
This bill authorizes FY2025 appropriations for the Department of Defense to construct a dining hall and services training facility at Savannah Air National Guard Base, Georgia.
